Background.data_info: For those with traffic congestion being high (B=1), the probability of talent being low (D=0) is 0.7216. The probability of talent being low (D=0) is 0.7410. The probability of traffic congestion being low (B=0) and talent being low (D=0) is 0.1141.

Questions.Instruction: Consider the probability of sufficiency (PS) of traffic congestion on talent.
Questions.Question: Given that traffic congestion was low and talent was low, what is the lower bound of the probability that talent would have been high if the traffic congestion had been high?

Reason.Step 1:
Calculate P(D=0|do(B=1))
P(D=0|do(B=1))=P(D=0|B=1)=0.7216
